title: Pro Tips: Optimizing Your Development Workflow
description: Learn essential tips and tricks to streamline your development process and boost productivity.

content.data:
Boost your development productivity with these proven tips:

Keyboard Shortcuts:
• VS Code: Ctrl+Shift+P (Command Palette)
• Git: git add . && git commit -m "message"
• Terminal: Ctrl+C (Stop), Ctrl+Z (Suspend)

Code Organization:
• Use meaningful variable names
• Comment complex logic
• Follow consistent formatting
• Use version control effectively

Debugging Techniques:
• Use console.log strategically
• Leverage browser dev tools
• Test in multiple browsers
• Use debugging tools and extensions

Time Management:
• Use the Pomodoro Technique
• Take regular breaks
• Set realistic goals
• Track your progress

content.caption: Example of clean, efficient code
